title: AI-assisted seller listing creation

summary: Assist buyers and sellers with drafting and triaging marketplace messages (questions, negotiation, logistics) safely.

title: Visual search & image-based product discovery
summary: Enable image-based product discovery: users search with photos; agent retrieves candidates and explains matches.

title: Fleet telematics & vehicle-health monitoring assistant
summary: Monitor fleet telemetry, detect anomalies, predict maintenance needs, and recommend interventions without unsafe automation.

summary: Dispatch/route mobile maintenance teams, schedule work orders, and coordinate parts/ETAs under SLA constraints.

title: Over-the-air vehicle software update orchestration
summary: Plan, stage, and monitor OTA software rollouts across vehicle fleets with safe gating, rollback, and audit trails.

title: Manufacturing line visual inspection assistant
summary: Run visual QA on production lines, flag defects, trigger rework flows, and manage human review thresholds.

title: In-vehicle voice assistant for local controls
summary: In-vehicle voice agent for local controls (HVAC, media, navigation settings) with strict safety and permission boundaries.

title: Banking virtual assistant
summary: Banking assistant for account info, troubleshooting, and guided actions with strong authentication and disclosure controls.

title: Interactive fraud alert & card controls assistant
summary: Interactive fraud alert assistant that helps users confirm/deny transactions and adjust card controls without social-engineering risk.

title: Virtual card number generation & checkout assistant
summary: Generate and manage virtual card numbers and checkout flows with user consent, limits, and fraud/abuse controls.

title: Digital dispute/chargeback intake assistant
summary: Guide customers through disputes/chargebacks, collect evidence, and submit cases while preventing leakage and manipulation.

title: AML suspicious-activity triage assistant
summary: Triage suspicious-activity alerts (AML) by summarizing signals, prioritizing cases, and documenting rationale for review.

title: IT service-desk virtual agent
summary: IT service-desk agent that triages tickets and performs safe self-service actions (resets, provisioning) with guardrails.

title: Service request triage assistant
summary: Route and prioritize service requests (ITSM/support) by extracting intent, urgency, and required approvals safely.

title: Work-item summarization assistant (thread + context summaries)
summary: Summarize long issue/ticket threads into structured context for handoffs and re-triage while resisting prompt injection and leakage.

title: Agentic orchestration for marketplace embedded lending

naics_2022.name: Other Activities Related to Credit Intermediation
